meanings.definition: Showing great care and perseverance in carrying out a task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The assiduous student always double-checked his work to ensure it was perfect.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her assiduous work ethic, never missing a deadline.
meanings.sent3: The assiduous squirrel meticulously gathered and stored nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her assiduous efforts in the garden made it bloom like a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The detective's assiduous investigation uncovered the truth behind the mystery.

meanings.definition: Constant in application or attention; diligent.
meanings.sent1: The assiduous worker never took a break until the job was done.
meanings.sent2: He was an assiduous reader, finishing multiple books each week.
meanings.sent3: The assiduous cat patiently waited by the door for its owner to return.
meanings.sent4: The assiduous sun rose every morning, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent5: The assiduous clock ticked away, marking each passing second with precision.
